hero.title: About ExplorAhead
hero.subtitle: We believe every journey should be as unique as the traveler taking it. For over 5 years, we've been crafting unforgettable experiences.

story.paragraph1: My journey to creating ExplorAhead led me through master's studies at the University of Wrocław and years of hands-on experience in the travel industry. That's where I gained deep practical knowledge of reservation systems, logistics coordination, and the intricate details that transform a good trip into an extraordinary one.
story.paragraph2: I watched countless travelers struggle with the overwhelming complexity of planning—comparing flights, researching hotels, coordinating transfers, finding authentic experiences. I knew there had to be a better way. So I decided to build a space where planning a trip becomes pure joy, not a stressful to-do list.
story.paragraph3: Today, I design personalized itineraries for people like you: curious travelers who want to experience unforgettable adventures but don't have the time to piece together complex travel puzzles on their own. You choose the destination—I take care of everything else, from the first booking to your safe return home.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do, from the destinations we recommend to the experiences we create.

passion.title: Passion for Travel
passion.description: Every destination tells a story. With years of personal travel and industry expertise, we transform locations into meaningful experiences that stay with you long after you return home.

expertise.title: Global Expertise
expertise.description: From navigating complex booking systems to uncovering hidden gems, our deep industry knowledge and worldwide connections ensure seamless, authentic journeys tailored to you.

personal.title: Personal Touch
personal.description: Whether luxury, adventure, or budget-friendly, we craft itineraries for all travelers and preferences, perfectly tailored to your unique lifestyle.

trust.title: Trust & Safety
trust.description: Your well-being is our priority. We partner only with vetted suppliers and provide 24/7 support.

flexibility.title: Flexible Planning
flexibility.description: Plans change, and we adapt. Whether you need last-minute adjustments or want to explore spontaneously, we make it work seamlessly.

value.title: Value for Every Budget
value.description: From budget-friendly adventures to luxury escapes, we maximize value at every price point without compromising on quality.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate travelers and industry experts dedicated to making your journey extraordinary.

alexandra.name: Alexandra Chen
alexandra.bio: Former diplomat turned travel entrepreneur with a passion for connecting cultures.

marcus.name: Marcus Williams
marcus.bio: 15 years in luxury hospitality, specializing in ultra-exclusive experiences.

sofia.name: Sofia Rodriguez
sofia.bio: Professional mountaineer and expedition leader with a love for the extraordinary.

james.name: James Nakamura
james.bio: AI and travel tech expert, pioneering the future of personalized travel.

hero.title: Simple & Fair Pricing
hero.subtitle:
Professional travel planning tailored to your needs.
No hidden fees, just honest service.

valueProposition.title: What You're Paying For
valueProposition.description: The service price does not include the cost of flights, accommodation, or attractions. My work is professional planning and logistics of your time—crafting the perfect itinerary so you can focus on enjoying your journey.

dreamFinder.subtitle: Don't know where to go?
dreamFinder.tagline: Let's discover your perfect destination together!
dreamFinder.question: "I want to go somewhere, but I don't know where..."
dreamFinder.answer: This is the perfect service for you! During a 45-minute consultation, we'll help you find your dream destination.

dreamFinder.bonusText: Book the Dream Plan after your consultation and get a 149 PLN discount!
dreamFinder.freeNote: This means the consultation is FREE when ordering a plan!
